languages.text: "Не тяжело ли тебе нести груз прожитых лет, седой воин? Не выйдет ли так, что рука подведет тебя в бою?"
"Do you not struggle to carry the burden of all your years, grey warrior? Will your hand not eventually betray you in combat?"
languages.original_text: "Не тяжело ли тебе нести груз прожитых лет, седой воин? Не выйдет ли так, что рука подведет тебя в бою?"

traits.locale_text: "Do you not struggle to carry the burden of all your years, grey warrior? Will your hand not eventually betray you in combat?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do you not struggle to carry the burden of all your years, grey warrior? Will your hand not eventually betray you in combat?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你正在努力挣扎，肩负起岁月的重担。难道不是如此吗，头发灰白的战士？到了最后，难道你的双手不会在战斗中背叛你吗？”
languages.original_text: "Do you not struggle to carry the burden of all your years, grey warrior? Will your hand not eventually betray you in combat?"

traits.locale_text: “你正在努力挣扎，肩负起岁月的重担。难道不是如此吗，头发灰白的战士？到了最后，难道你的双手不会在战斗中背叛你吗？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿No es dura la carga de todos tus años, guerrero gris? ¿No acabará por traicionarte tu mano en combate?».
languages.original_text: "Do you not struggle to carry the burden of all your years, grey warrior? Will your hand not eventually betray you in combat?"

traits.locale_text: «¿No es dura la carga de todos tus años, guerrero gris? ¿No acabará por traicionarte tu mano en combate?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「灰の戦士よ、お前は長年の重荷を背負うのに苦労しているのではないか。その手はいずれ、戦いでお前を裏切るのではないか？」
languages.original_text: "Do you not struggle to carry the burden of all your years, grey warrior? Will your hand not eventually betray you in combat?"

traits.locale_text: 「灰の戦士よ、お前は長年の重荷を背負うのに苦労しているのではないか。その手はいずれ、戦いでお前を裏切るのではないか？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Geratet Ihr unter der Last Eurer Jahre nicht langsam ins Wanken, grauer Krieger? Wird Eure Hand Euch im Kampf nicht eines Tages im Stich lassen?"
languages.original_text: "Do you not struggle to carry the burden of all your years, grey warrior? Will your hand not eventually betray you in combat?"

traits.locale_text: "Geratet Ihr unter der Last Eurer Jahre nicht langsam ins Wanken, grauer Krieger? Wird Eure Hand Euch im Kampf nicht eines Tages im Stich lassen?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Le poids des ans ne commence-t-il pas à se faire un pesant, guerrier grisonnant ? Ne craignez-vous pas que votre main finisse par vous trahir au combat ? »
languages.original_text: "Do you not struggle to carry the burden of all your years, grey warrior? Will your hand not eventually betray you in combat?"

traits.locale_text: « Le poids des ans ne commence-t-il pas à se faire un pesant, guerrier grisonnant ? Ne craignez-vous pas que votre main finisse par vous trahir au combat ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Do you not struggle to carry the burden of all your years, grey warrior? Will your hand not eventually betray you in combat?"

languages.text: "Onca yılın yükünü sırtında taşımaktan yorulmadın mı kır saçlı savaşçı? Elin er geç çatışmada yüzüstü bırakmayacak mı seni?"
languages.original_text: "Do you not struggle to carry the burden of all your years, grey warrior? Will your hand not eventually betray you in combat?"

traits.locale_text: "Onca yılın yükünü omuzlarında taşımaktan yorulmadın mı gri savaşçı? Elin nihayetinde çatışmada yüzüstü bırakmayacak mı seni?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
